questions.question: How does the free trial work?
questions.answer: Our free trial gives you access to all features for 7 days. No credit card is required to start, and you can cancel at any time during the trial period without being charged.

questions.question: Can I change plans at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time. The price difference will be prorated for the remainder of your billing cycle. You can also downgrade to a lower plan at the beginning of your next billing cycle.

questions.question: How does billing work?
questions.answer: Billing is monthly or annual, depending on the option you choose when signing up. Payments are automatically charged on the same day each month for monthly plans, or once a year for annual plans.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) as well as PayPal payments and bank transfers for Enterprise plans.

questions.question: How does technical support work?
questions.answer: All plans include email support. Professional and Enterprise plans also include priority support via phone and live chat during business hours. The Enterprise plan benefits from 24/7 support.
